attributes.action: Allow the tax paying public the choice on where their contributions go.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It can become increasingly annoying to the tax-paying public when their tax contributions are put to departments that are strongly opposed by the payee. Therefore we believe that as we are forced to pay tax by law, we should also, by law, have the choice on where our contributions go, and for what purposes they are being used.
